title: Distant neighbours
creator_credit: John Durst, Humphrey Swingler, British Petroleum and Greenpark Productions
brief_description: Illustrates the importance of light aircraft in maintaining communications with remote settlements, showing services operating in the Isle of Barra in the Outer Hebrides, in the frozen North-West Territory of Canada and in the desert outback of Central Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: John Durst, Humphrey Swingler, British Petroleum and Greenpark Productions
